Description:
Detects the execution of "csvde.exe" in order to export organizational Active Directory structure.

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Active Directory Structure Export Via Csvde.EXE
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((command like '% -f%' and (process_path like '%\csvde.exe' and original_file_name = 'csvde.exe')) and  not command like '% -i%')
